message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: because you aren't ready for marriage. and you weren't even in a relationship. with him.
Him: nah idt laurie should have even proposed to joe. biden.
Her: Haha, you think proposing to Joe Biden is a bad idea? Well, at least he's got the White House to offer instead of a boring old ring. 😜
Him: True, who needs a diamond when you can have Oval Office vibes? #PresidentialProposal

CONVERSATION 2
Her: because you aren't ready for marriage. and you weren't even in a relationship. with him.
Him: nah idt laurie should have even proposed to joe. biden.
Her: Seriously though, proposing without even being in a relationship is like asking for Netflix passwords without a subscription. No chance!
Him: Haha, you're right! You gotta earn those streaming privileges before asking for the ultimate commitment. 🎬 #NetflixAndWillYouMarryMe

CONVERSATION 3
Her: because you aren't ready for marriage. and you weren't even in a relationship. with him.
Him: nah idt laurie should have even proposed to joe. biden.
Her: Totally, proposing without a solid foundation is like trying to build a TikTok career without dance moves. It's just not gonna work.
Him: You got it! Can't expect a viral engagement without mastering the Renegade first. 💃💍 #DuetMeForLife

CONVERSATION 4
Her: because you aren't ready for marriage. and you weren't even in a relationship. with him.
Him: nah idt laurie should have even proposed to joe. biden.
Her: Preach! Proposing without a relationship is like buying AirPods without an iPhone. You'll have the look but none of the functionality. 😂
Him: So true! Gotta make sure all the pieces fit together like Apple's ecosystem before popping the question. 🍎💍 #MarriageOnMode

CONVERSATION 5
Her: because you aren't ready for marriage. and you weren't even in a relationship. with him.
Him: nah idt laurie should have even proposed to joe. biden.
Her: Ain't that the truth! Proposing without being in a relationship is like applying for college without ever attending high school. No foundation, no chance!
Him: Haha, exactly! Gotta complete those prerequisite courses of love before you're eligible for the ultimate degree in "Happily Ever After." 🎓💍 #LoveGraduation
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

    Here is the sample conversation-

    Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
    Him : yes yes yes. totally.

    An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

    CONVERSATION
    Her : im super wise wtf
    Him : of course, Socrates ;)
    ,
    CONVERSATION
    Her : im so smart
    Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

    I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

    I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

    Here is your prompt. 
    Her : Her : because you aren't ready for marriage. and you weren't even in a relationship. with him.  
    Him : Him : nah idt laurie should have even proposed to joe. biden. 
    
    The 5 Conversations must have unique messages for her and him. The prompt for 'her' must be different everytime.
